property.name: CardText
property.value: R (4+): Once per turn, before a control check is made, that check gets -4. Failing this control check will not end the Combat Phase.First E Commit, commit X foundations: Commit X of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your opponent commits 1 of their foundations.Akuma R Discard 1 momentum: After a control check is made, that check gets -4. Failing this control check will not end the Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your opponent commits 1 of their foundations. Each player may play this ability once per Enhance Step

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0.E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent commits 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: If this attack deals damage, your opponent commits All of the cards in their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum (6+): If this attack deals damage, your opponent's control checks get -2 for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this card: After your opponent makes a control check that check gets -4. Failing the check will not end your opponent's Combat Phase. Only playable during your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent makes a control check to play a block, that check gets -1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Commit 1 of your foundations and 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, the next control check your opponent makes this turn gets -X. X equals the number of foundations you committed to make this attack successful.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After an attack you have blocked resolves, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. If you reveal a Reversal, play it as a Reversal and the other revealed card is discarded. If you do not reveal a Reversal, commit this card and return the revealed cards to the top of your deck in any Order.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you block an attack, any attack you play as a Reversal to that attack gets +X damage. X equals the difference between the difficulty of your attack played as a reversal and the block modifier of the card you played to block.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy this card: For the rest of this turn, if your attack has a higher difficulty than any attack preceding it in your card pool, your attack gets +2 damage. If your character is Blanka, your attack gets +1 additional damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack played as a Reversal deals damage, All of your attacks get Reversal until the end of this turn.Blanka E: If this attack deals damage, the rest of your attacks this turn get +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack played as a Reversal after a low attack gets +3 damage.E: This attack played as a Reversal after a high attack gets +4 damage.Blanka E: This attack played as a Reversal after a mid attack gets +6 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If you reveal an attack, add this attack to your hand and add 1 of the revealed cards to your card pool face down. Discard any remaining revealed cards. If you do not reveal an attack, discard the revealed cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Look at your momentum, choose 1 Reversal and reveal it. Add the revealed Reversal to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +5 damage. Only playable if you have at least 3 attacks in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, commit 1 other foundation: Add 1 Reversal that did not deal damage from your card pool to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Once per turn, each player discards 1 card.First E: Commit All characters. If this is your attack, you cannot play any more enhances.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 3 momentum: After you take damage due to your opponent's card or ability, your opponent discards their hand.. If the next form this turn is a pass, each player draws cards up to their character's hand size.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before a player draws any number of cards, they discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This attack cannot be made unblockable.E: If this attack deals damage, commit All cards, discard All momentum, and return each player to their character's maximum vitality. Cards committed by this ability may not be readied until after your next turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0.E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, each player looks at their opponent's hand and discards 1 card from it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage. Each player destroys 1 of their assets.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 2 cards: Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose one card in their hand which they discard.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Each player reveals their hand and discards 1 card that does not have a block zone that matches this attack's zone.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E Discard 3 cards: Your opponent discards 3 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your attack deals damage, add that attack to your hand. Your Combat Phase ends.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Your first control check this turn gets -X. Your opponent discards X of their momentum. If you do not successfully play a card this Combat Phase, discard X cards at the end of the phase. X may not be more than your opponent's momentum.R Commit: After a response ability is played, cancel its effects. Only playable if you have more momentum than your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Reveal your opponent's momentum and discard 1 of them. Commit X of your foundations. X equals the discarded momentum's control.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this card, commit 2 foundations: After a response ability is played, cancel its effects. If the response was played from a card in a staging area, destroy it. If the response was played into a card pool, remove that card from the game instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If your opponent has no momentum, this card's difficulty is 5 and it gets 'Powerful: 3'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After your opponent's Ready Phase, if this card is fact up in your momentum, you may discard this card from your momentum to have them discard 1 of their momentum.E: If this attack is added to your momentum from your card pool this turn, add it face up.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets -1 damage. Your opponent discards 1 of their momentum.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: R: After your opponent discards any number of momentum due to one of your card effects, they discard 1 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: When your opponent's response ability would destroy or discard 1 of your cards in play, return the destroyed or discarded card to your hand instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Destroy this card: For the rest of this turn, your opponent may not play responses to cards being played.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Commit: Commit 1 card with a response ability printed on it.Guy E Destroy this card: Your control checks for the rest of this turn get -1. Commit All cards with response abilities printed on them.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After a keyword ability is played, cancel its effects.E: Remove 1 attack in your discard pile from the game. Change the zone of this attack to the attack zone of the removed attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Choose 1 attack zone. All attack zones on attacks played this turn are changed to that attack zone.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays a card with a keyword ability, reduce All keyword ratings on that card to 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 random momentum: Change this attack's zone to the attack zone of the discarded card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Reveal your hand. This attack gets +X speed. X equals the number of revealed attacks with an attack zone that matches this attack's zone

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your opponent may not play any keyword abilities.Karin E Discard 1 card: This attack is unblockable: If this attack deals damage, the Combat Phase ends.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Reveal your hand: Your opponent reveals their hand. Either change the attack zone of this attack to any other zone or your opponent discard 1 card with a keyword ability (your choice).

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Until the beginning of your next Ready Phase, All keyword abilities either get +1 to their rating or -1 to their rating (your choice).

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: R: After you resolve the effects of a keyword ability, play it again, paying all costs.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Add 1 card from your hand to your card pool face down: After your opponent plays a keyword ability, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, each player draws X cards. X equals the damage dealt.E Commit 1 foundation: Each player chooses 1 of their opponent's momentum which is discarded.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Draw X cards. X equals the number of ready foundations in your staging area. Discard cards until the number of cards in your hand is equal to or less than your character's hand size. If your character is Ken, discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Ken First F Discard 2 cards: Until the end of your next turn, players may only ready X foundations during their Ready Step. X equals the number of cards in their hand.E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Each player draws 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, players cannot ready foundations until the end of your next turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, draw X cards and your opponent discards X of their momentum. Discard cards until the number of cards in your hand is equal to or less than your character's hand size. X equals the amount of damage this attack deals.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, discard 1 of your opponent's momentum and draw 1 card.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: R: After a player draws any number of cards, that player discards their entire momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this card: Before readying cards during your Ready Step, each player chooses a foundation in their opponent's staging area. All copies of the chosen foundation are committed, and may not be readied until the beginning of your next turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Each player draws 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 2 momentum: After a player's Ready Phase, control checks to play attacks get either +1 for the rest of this turn or -1 for the rest of this turn (your choice).R Commit: After an attack is played, that attack gets +X damage. X equals the amount the control check to play that attack was modified by.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Lose 3 Vitality: After a control check to play an attack is made, that check gets -3. Failing this control check will not end the Combat Phase.M. Bison R Lose 2 vitality: After a control check to play an attack is made, that check gets +3 or -3. Failing this control check will not end the Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: For the rest of this turn, your attacks get +X damage. X equals the number of attacks that dealt damage preceding this attack in your card pool. If your character is M. Bison, your attack gets an additional +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Desperation E: If this attack is played as a Reversal deals damage, your opponent takes an additional 2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your staging area, before a control check to play an attack is made, you may discard 1 card and remove 1 Psycho token from this card to give that check -1. If this card has 0 tokens, destroy it.E: If this attack deals damage, before you clear your card pool add this card to your staging area and place X Psycho tokens on it. X equals the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After your opponent makes a control check to block this attack with an attack, that check gets -2 and your opponent may change the block's zone to match this attack's zone.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After a control check for an attack has been modified, return that check to its starting value and that attack gets +X damage. X equals the amount the control check was modified by.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 damage. The next control check you make to play an attack this turn gets +2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Place 1 Psycho token on this card.R Commit, remove All Psycho tokens from this card: After you make a control check to play an attack, that control check gets +X or if the attack is played it gets +X damage (your choice). X equals the number of Psycho tokens removed from this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard 1 momentum: Before you make a control check to play an attack, that check gets -X. If that attack is played, it gets +X damage. X equals the discarded momentum's control.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Once per turn, draw X cards. X equals your momentum.E: Add X cards from any player's discard pile to the bottom of that player's deck in any Order you choose. X equals your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard X momentum: Draw X cards.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, each player adds 2 cards from their discard pile to the bottom of their deck in any order.

property.name: CardText
property.value: At the beginning of your Combat Phase each player adds the bottom card of their deck to their momentum.E Commit: Draw 4 cards. Only playable if you have 0 cards in hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attacks as if this card had a mid block of +0.E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, add any combination of X cards from both you and your opponent's discard pile to the bottom of their owner's decks in any Order. X equals the damage dealt by this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Reveal your momentum. Your opponent chooses X momentum revealed this way. Add the chosen momentum to the bottom of your deck in any Order. Your opponent does the same with you choosing. X equals either the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard X momentum: After you take damage, each player adds X cards from their discard pile to the bottom of their deck in any Order. Each player adds X of their momentum to their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of foundations in your card pool.E: If this attack deals damage, name a foundation in your staging area. Search your deck for a copy of the named foundation and then add it to your staging area committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 2 foundations: After a foundation is added to your staging area, remove it from the game. Search your deck for 1 foundation that you could normAlly play with a difficulty of X or less and add it to your staging area committed. X equals the difficulty of the removed foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy this card: Search your deck for 1 foundation that you could normAlly play with a difficulty of 3 or less and add it to your staging area committed. You may discard 2 momentum to return this card to your hand instead of destroying it when you pay the cost of this ability.

property.name: CardText

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of committed foundations in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this foundation, or 1 of your other foundations, is destroyed due to your opponent's card or ability, search your deck for any number of copies of that card and add them to your staging area committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play a foundation, for the rest of this turn any foundation with the same control as the foundation you just played gets -1 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Gain 2 vitality. Only playable during your opponent's turn.F Commit: Once per turn, choose 1 card in your discard pile. Until the end of this turn, as long as the chosen card is in your discard pile, it may be played once as though it were in your hand.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage and if you have a ranged attack in your card pool, choose 1 kick in your discard pile. Until the end of this turn, as long as the chosen kick is in your discard pile you may play that kick once as though it were in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, choose 1 throw in your discard pile. Until the end of this turn, as long as this chosen throw is in your discard pile you may play that throw once as through it were in your hand.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Gain 2 vitality. Only playable during your opponent's turn.

If they cannot play the discarded block, they may attempt to block with a card from their hand as normal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this card: After your opponent's Ready Phase, each player makes a control check. If your control check is highest, until the end of the turn after any attack is played, that attack gets -X damage (minimum 1). X equals your control check.

Your opponent may attempt to block again.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: For the rest of this turn, after you play a card with a higher printed difficulty than the preceding card in your card pool, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent plays an asset, character, or foundation, discard it from their card pool.[All] Character R: After your opponent plays an action, discard it from their card pool, cancel its effects, and then your opponent draws 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, commit 1 foundation: When you could block during the Block Step of this attack make a control check against a difficulty of X. If successful, this attack is completely blocked. X equals the speed of this attack.[Good] Character R Commit, discard 1 momentum: When you could block during the Block Step, this attack is completely blocked. You may not attempt to block from your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +1 speed and +3 damage. Only playable is this attack is preceded by a non-attack card in your card pool.[Fire] Character E Commit, commit 1 foundation: Draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 momentum: Ready any other card in your staging area that has not been readied this Combat Phase. Only playable if you have successfully played a card from your hand this turn. Either player may play this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: When you are taking damage, reduce that amount of damage taken by 1 (minimum 1).[Earth] Character R Remove 1 card in your discard pile from the game: When you are taking damage, reduce that amount of damage taken by 2 (minimum 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Look at the top X cards of your deck. Discard any number of those cards and replace the remaining cards on top of your deck in any Order. X equals the number of committed foundations in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent fails to play a card from their hand as a form, play a card as a form from your hand at +1 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 2 cards: After your opponent's Ready Step, commit 1 foundation or asset. If your character has the [Order] resource symbol, commit 2 foundations or assets instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play a card that shares at least 2 resource symbols with your character, commit any card that shares at least 1 resource symbol with the card you played.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays an enhance, cancel its effects.[Void] Character R Commit, discard 2 momentum: After your opponent plays an attack, skip that attack's Enhance Step and go directly to the Block Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 card, discard 1 momentum: Your opponent discards 1 card and discards 1 of their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Until the end of this turn, your control checks to play non-attacks get +1.[Chaos] Character F Discard 2 momentum: Until the end of this turn, your control checks get +1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Commit: Players must discard down to their character's hand size. Until the beginning of your next turn, players may not draw cards or add cards to their hand during a Combat Phase.[Life] Character R Discard 1 card: After you take damage from your opponent's card or ability, gain X vitality. X equals the difficulty of the card discarded for this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck then replace them in any Order.[Evil] Character E Discard 1 momentum: Ready this card. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 1 momentum, discard 1 card: Discard 3 cards from your card pool.
